scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c -f umd -n htmresearchviz0 -o build/htmresearchviz0-bundle.js -- js/index.js && mkdir -p py/htmresearchviz0/package_data && cp build/htmresearchviz0-bundle.js py/htmresearchviz0/package_data/htmresearchviz0-bundle.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/htmresearchviz0.zip -- README.md build/htmresearchviz0-bundle.js && cp build/htmresearchviz0-bundle.js py/htmresearchviz0/package_data/htmresearchviz0-bundle.js
